## cloneDeep() function

Performs a deep clone for the value, supports just plain objects and arrays

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function _cloneDeep(aValue: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aValue | <code>any</code> | the value to clone |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`

the cloned object
